channel.title: Re-sharing another’s de-listed theme to the Directory?
channel.description:
I’ve found myself in possession of a drafts theme entitled “Black & Yellow” which has apparently become homeless.
![Black & Yellow Theme](upload://ezaWDFokQ7EoshZu74YpNCWdUOw.png)
It’s actually been one of my favorite dark themes in the past few months. I’m just wondering: was this a default theme? Would anyone like to claim it? And if not... would it be inappropriate for me to put it back on the Directory with this explanation?

item.title: Re-sharing another’s de-listed theme to the Directory?
item.dc:creator: Blue
item.description:
Thank you for the response! I’ve listed it for those interested.

Read full topic
item.source: Re-sharing another’s de-listed theme to the Directory?

item.title: Re-sharing another’s de-listed theme to the Directory?
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
Not sure what the original source was…themes can be installed from the directory, which should maintain a link, but can be installed from files or other sources which were never in the directory.

I think you are fine to share it again. It is definitely not a default theme.

Read full topic
item.source: Re-sharing another’s de-listed theme to the Directory?
